description.name: btctrc20
description.tagline: BTC trc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto trc20-btc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept BTC trc20 directly on your website
Unique trc20/btc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your trc20/btc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
